attributes.background: Make school at night time instead of day time.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure when exactly you'd like school to take place and why you'd like this to happen. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
